attributes.action: Vote on whether a redevelopment, including Everton Football Ground, comes to Kirkby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want to have a democratic vote to allow the people of Kirkby to say whether they want Everton
football club built in our town, on one of the few remaining public green areas.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Vote on whether a redevelopment, including Everton Football Ground, comes to Kirkby."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13313.asp

Prime Minister's Office
